meanings.definition: A person or group having administrative or supervisory authority in an organization.
meanings.sent1: The executives at the company make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The executives met to discuss the budget for the upcoming year.
meanings.sent3: The executives decided to have a pizza party for the staff.
meanings.sent4: The executives are the captains steering the ship of the company.
meanings.sent5: The executives are like the kings and queens of the business kingdom.

meanings.definition: A person or group responsible for the execution of a particular task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The executives completed the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The executives were praised for their efficient work.
meanings.sent3: The executives were like superheroes swooping in to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The executives executed their plan flawlessly, like skilled artists.
meanings.sent5: The executives' actions spoke louder than their words.
